<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Brains!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3561) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 61

**Archetype** [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182)

**Prerequisites**
[Feast](/Feats.aspx?ID=3559)

**Trigger**
You Feast upon a [humanoid's](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) brain. The humanoid can't be [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) (or, if you're Feasting on a corpse, can't have been mindless while alive).

</column>

---

You consume the brains of your foe, causing synapses long rotten to fire and enabling you to shake off your mental torpor. You gain a +1 status bonus on skill checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) for 1 hour. If the humanoid had a higher modifier to the skill check you're using to Recall Knowledge than you do, the status bonus increases to +2.
name: Brains!
